Sponsor.Name: Code Smith
Sponsor.Description:
CodeSmith Tools is a privately-held software company specializing in the creation of software tools that help developers be more productive. Our goal is to build the best developer tools available to help developers around the world get their jobs done faster and help them avoid repetitive work.

We believe in being open and available to our customers, and listening to what they have to say. Our highest priority is the success of our customers, followed by continued innovation with our products.
